titles: This prymer of Salysbury vse is set out a long wout ony serchyng with many prayers, and goodly pyctures in the kale[n]der, in the matyns of our lady, in the houres of the crosse in the. vii. psalmes, and in the dyryge.
author: Catholic Church.
Quentin, Jean. Manière de bien vivre dévotement par chacun jour.
Copland, Robert, fl. 1508-1547.
publisher: [Per Franciscum Regnault in vico sancti iacobi, e regione maturinorum. Ad signum Elephantis],
notes: Includes, with caption title "The maner to lyue well", a translation by Robert Copland of: Quentin, Jean.  La Manière de bien vivre dévotement par chacun jour.
Woodcut illustration on title page and throughout text.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
keywords: Primers (Prayer-books) --  Catholic Church --  Early works to 1800.
